assigned.externalId.description: Select the employee you want to assign this issue to.You assign an issue to the person who needs to take the next step in resolving the issue.The employees you see in this list vary according to your role permissions.
assigned.externalId.name: assigned.externalId

assigned.internalId.description: Select the employee you want to assign this issue to.You assign an issue to the person who needs to take the next step in resolving the issue.The employees you see in this list vary according to your role permissions.
assigned.internalId.name: assigned.internalId

assigned.name.description: Select the employee you want to assign this issue to.You assign an issue to the person who needs to take the next step in resolving the issue.The employees you see in this list vary according to your role permissions.
assigned.name.name: assigned.name

buildBroken.externalId.description: Select the build for the version where this issue occurred.
buildBroken.externalId.name: buildBroken.externalId

buildBroken.internalId.description: Select the build for the version where this issue occurred.
buildBroken.internalId.name: buildBroken.internalId

buildBroken.name.description: Select the build for the version where this issue occurred.
buildBroken.name.name: buildBroken.name

buildFixed.externalId.description: Select the build for the version where this issue was fixed.
buildFixed.externalId.name: buildFixed.externalId

buildFixed.internalId.description: Select the build for the version where this issue was fixed.
buildFixed.internalId.name: buildFixed.internalId

buildFixed.name.description: Select the build for the version where this issue was fixed.
buildFixed.name.name: buildFixed.name

buildTarget.externalId.description: Select the build for the version in which this issue is scheduled to be fixed.
buildTarget.externalId.name: buildTarget.externalId

buildTarget.internalId.description: Select the build for the version in which this issue is scheduled to be fixed.
buildTarget.internalId.name: buildTarget.internalId

buildTarget.name.description: Select the build for the version in which this issue is scheduled to be fixed.
buildTarget.name.name: buildTarget.name

createdDate.description: This field displays the date when this issue was originally created.
createdDate.name: createdDate

emailAssignee.description: Check this box to email the person this issue is assigned to.You may want to email the assignee any time an important comment is added or whenever a change is made to the issue record.
emailAssignee.name: emailAssignee

externalAbstract.description: Enter an abstract for this issue that customers should see when they log in to the NetSuite Support Center.
externalAbstract.name: externalAbstract

externalDetails.description: Enter a summary of the details for this issue that customers should see when they log in to the NetSuite Support Center.
externalDetails.name: externalDetails

isOwner.description: Check this box if you want this issue assigned to you every time it comes back to your team.You cannot check this box if this issue is assigned to someone else with your type of role. To own the issue, either assign the issue to yourself or change the issue status to a status associated with another role type. Only one person per role type can own an issue.
isOwner.name: isOwner

isReviewed.description: Check this box if the work done to resolve this issue has been reviewed.
isReviewed.name: isReviewed

isShowStopper.description: This field displays whether or not this issue is a showstopper.Showstopper issues must be fixed before the next version can be released.
isShowStopper.name: isShowStopper

issueAbstract.description: Enter a short summary of the issue.This abstract is only available to internal users and is only seen by customers if you do not enter an external abstract on the External subtab.
issueAbstract.name: issueAbstract

issueNumber.description: Enter a number for this issue.If you use Auto-Generated Numbering, this number is automatically generated to avoid duplicate numbers and ensure consecutive numbering.
issueNumber.name: issueNumber

issueStatus.externalId.description: Select the current status for this issue.The issue status usually needs to be updated every time the bug is updated or assigned to a new person.
issueStatus.externalId.name: issueStatus.externalId

issueStatus.internalId.description: Select the current status for this issue.The issue status usually needs to be updated every time the bug is updated or assigned to a new person.
issueStatus.internalId.name: issueStatus.internalId

issueStatus.name.description: Select the current status for this issue.The issue status usually needs to be updated every time the bug is updated or assigned to a new person.
issueStatus.name.name: issueStatus.name

issueType.externalId.description: Select what type of issue this is.Administrators can define issue types at <_TABNAME=ADMI_ISSUETYPE_> > <_TASKCATEGORY=ADMI_ISSUETYPE_> > Issue Types.
issueType.externalId.name: issueType.externalId

issueType.internalId.description: Select what type of issue this is.Administrators can define issue types at <_TABNAME=ADMI_ISSUETYPE_> > <_TASKCATEGORY=ADMI_ISSUETYPE_> > Issue Types.
issueType.internalId.name: issueType.internalId

issueType.name.description: Select what type of issue this is.Administrators can define issue types at <_TABNAME=ADMI_ISSUETYPE_> > <_TASKCATEGORY=ADMI_ISSUETYPE_> > Issue Types.
issueType.name.name: issueType.name

item.externalId.description: If this issue is associated with an item, select the item.
item.externalId.name: item.externalId

item.internalId.description: If this issue is associated with an item, select the item.
item.internalId.name: item.internalId

item.name.description: If this issue is associated with an item, select the item.
item.name.name: item.name

module.externalId.description: Select the module of the product selected that is affected by this issue.
module.externalId.name: module.externalId

module.internalId.description: Select the module of the product selected that is affected by this issue.
module.internalId.name: module.internalId

module.name.description: Select the module of the product selected that is affected by this issue.
module.name.name: module.name

newDetails.description: Enter any new information or communication about this issue.
newDetails.name: newDetails

priority.externalId.description: Select a priority level to denote when this issue needs to be resolved.A priority of 1 should receive attention first, and a priority of 9 does not need immediate attention.
priority.externalId.name: priority.externalId

priority.internalId.description: Select a priority level to denote when this issue needs to be resolved.A priority of 1 should receive attention first, and a priority of 9 does not need immediate attention.
priority.internalId.name: priority.internalId

priority.name.description: Select a priority level to denote when this issue needs to be resolved.A priority of 1 should receive attention first, and a priority of 9 does not need immediate attention.
priority.name.name: priority.name

product.externalId.description: Select the product affected by this issue.Administrators can create product records with modules at <_TABNAME=ADMI_ISSUEPRODUCT_> > <_TASKCATEGORY=ADMI_ISSUEPRODUCT_> > Products > New.Products are tracked separately from item records. You can associate multiple items with a product on product records.
product.externalId.name: product.externalId

product.internalId.description: Select the product affected by this issue.Administrators can create product records with modules at <_TABNAME=ADMI_ISSUEPRODUCT_> > <_TASKCATEGORY=ADMI_ISSUEPRODUCT_> > Products > New.Products are tracked separately from item records. You can associate multiple items with a product on product records.
product.internalId.name: product.internalId

product.name.description: Select the product affected by this issue.Administrators can create product records with modules at <_TABNAME=ADMI_ISSUEPRODUCT_> > <_TASKCATEGORY=ADMI_ISSUEPRODUCT_> > Products > New.Products are tracked separately from item records. You can associate multiple items with a product on product records.
product.name.name: product.name

productTeam.externalId.description: Select the product team that is responsible for this issue.When this issue is first entered, it is emailed to members of this product team.
productTeam.externalId.name: productTeam.externalId

productTeam.internalId.description: Select the product team that is responsible for this issue.When this issue is first entered, it is emailed to members of this product team.
productTeam.internalId.name: productTeam.internalId

productTeam.name.description: Select the product team that is responsible for this issue.When this issue is first entered, it is emailed to members of this product team.
productTeam.name.name: productTeam.name

reportedBy.externalId.description: This field displays the name of the person who created this issue record.For users working in the UI, this field is always read-only.In web services and SuiteScript, you can set a value for this field when creating a new record. However, when interacting with an existing record, the field is read-only.
reportedBy.externalId.name: reportedBy.externalId

reportedBy.internalId.description: This field displays the name of the person who created this issue record.For users working in the UI, this field is always read-only.In web services and SuiteScript, you can set a value for this field when creating a new record. However, when interacting with an existing record, the field is read-only.
reportedBy.internalId.name: reportedBy.internalId

reportedBy.name.description: This field displays the name of the person who created this issue record.For users working in the UI, this field is always read-only.In web services and SuiteScript, you can set a value for this field when creating a new record. However, when interacting with an existing record, the field is read-only.
reportedBy.name.name: reportedBy.name

reproduce.externalId.description: Select where this issue can be reproduced:    * In test environment  this issue can be experienced in internal test accounts.    * In user's environment ONLY  this issue can not be experienced in internal test accounts.    * Not reproduced  this issue has not been reproduced.
reproduce.externalId.name: reproduce.externalId

reproduce.internalId.description: Select where this issue can be reproduced:    * In test environment  this issue can be experienced in internal test accounts.    * In user's environment ONLY  this issue can not be experienced in internal test accounts.    * Not reproduced  this issue has not been reproduced.
reproduce.internalId.name: reproduce.internalId

reproduce.name.description: Select where this issue can be reproduced:    * In test environment  this issue can be experienced in internal test accounts.    * In user's environment ONLY  this issue can not be experienced in internal test accounts.    * Not reproduced  this issue has not been reproduced.
reproduce.name.name: reproduce.name

reviewer.externalId.description: Select the person's name who reviewed the work done to resolve this issue.
reviewer.externalId.name: reviewer.externalId

reviewer.internalId.description: Select the person's name who reviewed the work done to resolve this issue.
reviewer.internalId.name: reviewer.internalId

reviewer.name.description: Select the person's name who reviewed the work done to resolve this issue.
reviewer.name.name: reviewer.name

severity.externalId.description: Select the severity of this issue from the list defined by your administrator.For information on how to set up severity criteria, see the help topic Issue Severities.
severity.externalId.name: severity.externalId

severity.internalId.description: Select the severity of this issue from the list defined by your administrator.For information on how to set up severity criteria, see the help topic Issue Severities.
severity.internalId.name: severity.internalId

severity.name.description: Select the severity of this issue from the list defined by your administrator.For information on how to set up severity criteria, see the help topic Issue Severities.
severity.name.name: severity.name

source.externalId.description: Select where information about this issue originated.
source.externalId.name: source.externalId

source.internalId.description: Select where information about this issue originated.
source.internalId.name: source.internalId

source.name.description: Select where information about this issue originated.
source.name.name: source.name

trackCode.value.description: Select the times when you want to be notified by email on the progress of this issue.You can choose be notified Never, On Any Change, When Asserted Fixed, When Confirmed Fixed, or if it Could Not be Reproduced.
trackCode.value.name: trackCode.value

type.value.description: Select the product team that is responsible for this issue.When this issue is first entered, it is emailed to members of this product team.
type.value.name: type.value

versionBroken.externalId.description: Select the product version where this issue occurred.Versions are created and maintained from product records.
